thePenance:Innocent.NAME: "Innocent"
thePenance:Innocent.FLAVOR: Before dawn, there are two ways to coexist with the night: either let it soak through you until you can no longer feel it; or search the night for everything that shouldn't have been swallowed by it, and cherish it carefully.

thePenance:LetterOfGratitude.NAME: Letter of Thanks
thePenance:LetterOfGratitude.FLAVOR: ...But at least everything you did was worth it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yBarrier , gain an additional #b20% (minimum of #b1 ).

thePenance:BloodstainedCloth.NAME: Bloodstained Fabric
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b-2 #yStrength and #b8 #yThorn #yAura .

thePenance:LittleGavel.NAME: Small Gavel
thePenance:LittleGavel.FLAVOR: Even the greatest justice must start from somewhere small.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your #yBlock is broken, gain #yBarrier equal to the damage absorbed by that Block.

thePenance:BlackUmbrella.NAME: Black Umbrella
thePenance:BlackUmbrella.FLAVOR: What bad timing, you chose to come to Syracusa now?
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, when your #yBlock is broken, apply 1 #yVulnerable to the attacker and gain 1 #yStrength .

thePenance:GoldenScales.NAME: Golden Scales
thePenance:GoldenScales.FLAVOR: Can crimes be punished through methods outside of the law?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you discarded an #yAttack this turn, gain 1 #ySelf-Defense .

thePenance:ThornboundCodex.NAME: Thornbound Codex
thePenance:ThornboundCodex.FLAVOR: What the law does not specify, I will reveal through practice.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the end of your turn, put a #rWolfpack #rCurse on top of your draw pile.

thePenance:ShopVoucher.NAME: Shop Voucher
thePenance:ShopVoucher.FLAVOR: If you come here during the rainy season of Syracusa, why not find a small shop by the street and sit for a while.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your #yJudgment deals damage, deal an additional #b2 damage.

thePenance:PlasticMole.NAME: Plastic Mole
thePenance:PlasticMole.FLAVOR: At least in the game, the gavel will land solidly on the heads of these plastic moles.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 Energy for every #b3 times an enemy intends to attack.

thePenance:SiracusanWine.NAME: Syracusan Wine
thePenance:SiracusanWine.FLAVOR: Expensive goods from Syracusa. Whether its effect is to relieve fatigue or alleviate pain, the moment you see the price, it all turns into stress.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each combat, the first time you lose #b8 or more HP, gain #b3 Max HP and heal #b4 HP.

thePenance:CarnivalMoment.NAME: Time of Revelry
thePenance:CarnivalMoment.FLAVOR: Behold, this is Syracusaâ€”The Lord of Revelry invites you to enjoy the show!

thePenance:MedalOfPerseverance.NAME: Medal of Perseverance
thePenance:MedalOfPerseverance.FLAVOR: Some think this is a design error, others think the numbers are broken. But you, my friend, you proved that as long as you are willing to spend time stacking Barrier, nothing is unkillable. This is your reward, don't despise it, after all, you tortured that poor guy enough. Don't worry, this text overflow is also calculated.
DESCRIPTIONS: Congratulations, you proved your perseverance by stacking Barrier!
